blogPost.excerpt: The Orbit Shift Podcast is an initiative by Freshworks for Startups to help startups scale. We bring you practical advice from the world’s leading experts to help make better decisions across business functions such as sales, marketing, management, and so on.
blogPost.body: The Orbit Shift Podcast is an initiative by Freshworks for Startups to help startups scale. We bring you practical advice from the world’s leading experts to help make better decisions across business functions such as sales, marketing, management, and so on.
blogPost.title: The Orbit Shift Podcast - Practical insights for startups looking to scale.
blogPost.author: Jayadevan PK

localize.description: Orbit Shift播客是Freshworks for Startups帮助初创企业扩大规模的一项举措。我们为您带来来自全球顶尖专家的实用建议，帮助您在销售、营销、管理等业务职能上做出更好的决策。
localize.tagline: 对于希望扩大规模的初创企业的实用见解。

localize.description: Orbit Shift播客是Freshworks for Startups幫助初創企業擴大規模的一項舉措。我們爲您帶來來自全球頂尖專家的實用建議，幫助您在銷售、營銷、管理等業務職能上做出更好的決策。
localize.tagline: 對於希望擴大規模的初創企業的實用見解。

previous.excerpt: tw-rl is an advanced bookmarking and curation tool for twitter. Once connected, easily showcase tweet media or "loop" threads together. Use cases: portfolio, blog, mood board, inspiration gallery.
previous.title: tw-rl - Curate Twitter. Save and organize tweets or threads

localize.description: tw-rl是一款先进的twitter书签和策划工具。一旦连接起来，就可以轻松地展示tweet媒体或将线程 "循环 "在一起。使用案例：组合、博客、心情板、灵感库。
localize.tagline: 策划Twitter。保存和组织推文或线程

localize.description: tw-rl是一款先進的twitter書籤和策劃工具。一旦連接起來，就可以輕鬆地展示tweet媒體或將線程 "循環 "在一起。使用案例：組合、博客、心情板、靈感庫。
localize.tagline: 策劃Twitter。保存和組織推文或線程
